tasks.label: Deploy to GitHub
tasks.command: git add . && (git diff --cached --quiet && echo 'No changes to commit' || git commit -m 'Update build') && git pull --rebase --autostash origin main && git push origin main

tasks.label: Deploy (force new build)
tasks.command: git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Force Pages rebuild' && git pull --rebase --autostash origin main && git push origin main

tasks.label: Show git remotes
tasks.command: git remote -v && git branch -vv && git status
